transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji, Deepak ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, Deepak ji namaskar, aap Agrawal Enterprises kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir, aapse ek bhi baat karni thi. Main actually business manager baat kar raha hu sir, Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Customer: Sir ji.
Executive: Aapne sir call kiya tha na, uh, hamara jo customer care hai us pe?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Haan, sir bataiye, main dekh raha hu sir, aap hi handle karte hain sir IndiaMART ka profile ya koi aur karta hai aapke alawa?
Customer: Nahi karta hu main. Mere ko ek baar hi bataiye na, aap kis post pe ho?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Aap kis post pe ho IndiaMART mein?
Executive: Main as a business manager kaam kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Aur Sanjeev Choudhary kis post pe hai?
Executive: Woh aapke account manager hai.
Customer: Aap unse senior ho?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Toh aisa mujhe bataiye ki agar koi customer ek baar hi bata diya ki he is not working, his business is not working well, he is not interested in renewing the uh, account in IndiaMART, toh uske baad use aap log 10 baar, 50 baar call karke kya matlab use beizzat karte ho kya aap log?
Executive: Nahi, nahi sir dekhiye.
Customer: Maine clearly Sanjeev ji ko maine clearly jab bol diya ki sir ji hamara abhi business jo humne start kiya tha woh business hamara running pe nahi hai aur new product abhi tak aaya nahi hai, aane wala tha, toh abhi main renew nahi karne wala. Aur woh chaar se paanch baar, cheh baar, saat baar bol chuka hu main.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Uske baad bhi woh banda mujhe call pe call kyun kiye ja raha hai? Matlab har kuch dino pe ek call karta hai. Ek baar bol diya ki main interested nahi hu, aap kyun interested nahi ho, kyun nahi karna chahte ho, kya nahi karna chahte ho. You are doing your job. Aap apna job kar rahe ho, aap aapko call karne ko milta hai, aap call kar diye. You got the answer. I gave you the answer that I am not interested currently, mera business abhi sahi nahi chal raha hai. Tab mujhse kitni baar baar bulwana chahte ho ki mera business sahi nahi chal raha?
Executive: Okay. Sir, first of all I apologize.
Customer: Finally main ek cheez kehna chahunga, mere ko agar lagega ki IndiaMART is a good platform for my business, I will call by myself. I don't want any call from IndiaMART.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Okay. Theek hai sir dekhiye, first of all I, I again apologize from my end sir. Jo bhi aapka experience raha. But main yeh dekh raha hu sir yeh jo product line hai aapka yeh boxite ore, boxite lumps, yeh aapka pura product line hi change kar rahe hain ya kya hai sir?
Customer: Woh hamara product chal hi nahi raha hai toh woh product hi main business woh band kar rakha hu. Toh product line hi change ho raha hai.
Executive: Achha, achha. Actually sir hota kya hai na.
Customer: Jo hamara product hai woh aapke IndiaMART pe bechna nahi hai, woh bikega nahi.
Executive: Kaunsa product hai sir?
Customer: Bhaiya hamara petrol pump hai. Toh ab us petrol pump ka main IndiaMART pe advertisement daal du? Kaun lega tel aake?
Executive: Hmm hmm. Toh matlab aap completely ek different product line mein ja rahe hain aap?
Customer: Completely different line mein ja raha hu. Clearly maine Sanjeev ko bata diya hai yeh cheez. Bekaar mein time pass kar raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai sir, I understand. Karo bhai aap, mere ko jab interested lagega, mere paas koi product rahega ki IndiaMART ke through bech sakta hu, toh main call karunga. Khud hi main usme.
Executive: Haan haan. Actually, actually sir main ek last cheez aapko bolna chahunga, dekhiye woh at the end of the day woh aapka call hai sir. But hota kya hai aapka obviously ek online presence aur ek visibility create hota hai. Aur kyunki ek saal purana catalog hai aapka, toh woh aapke paas advantage hai. Toh main aapko yahi suggest karunga ki uh, yeh jo amount aap pay karenge, it is not a big deal in terms of marketing agar aapko apne other products ka bhi advertisement karna hai toh. Kyunki already woh base aapka bana hua hai. Aur agar aap koi bhi product yaha par add karte hain na sir toh woh in what, yeh jo aapka product line hai current wala, iska toh main dekh raha hu uh, actually mein hamare paas bhi jo approved buyleads hai woh kam hai.
Hamare paas bhi bahut kam iska requirement aa raha hai. Toh I understand yahi, toh aapke paas toh already phir bahut kam aa raha hoga. Aap agar isko change bhi kar rahe hain sir, aap isko uh, that is your call only. Aap chahe toh yeh jo apna catalog hai sir, at least, main yeh nahi keh raha hu aap abhi decide kijiye, aap agla do-chaar din mein jab bhi aapko lage, aap isme decide kijiye aur main aapko yahi suggest karunga ki aap isme product line apna change bhi kar rahe hain na sir, aap woh discuss kar sakte hain kyunki hamare paas toh kaafi saare phir har ek product line mein registered hai. Toh hum usme definitely kuch na kuch better input hi denge aapko. Hai na? Woh karna na karna woh baad ki baat hai sir.
Customer: Product ka hamare paas abhi jo present pe hai na, kisi tarah ka koi abhi product launch karne ka, new product jo aapke through main bech sakta hu, uska bhi koi mera abhi koi irada nahi hai. Woh abhi long term mein mujhe lagta hai ki woh product abhi main launch nahi kar paunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Kyunki sir hamare paas na, matlab hamare kai saare clients hai jinse bahut achha relation hai sir. Unhone apna catalog jo hai ek-ek saal tak bhi aise hi run kiya hai kyunki unko bhi malum hai ki woh presence aur visibility mein banane mein woh time lagta hai, woh raato raat nahi hota hai. Toh usko unhone retain rakha aur jab unke products ready hue.
Customer: Dekho sir ji, main clear yeh bata raha hu, main abhi thoda sa na medical issues se bhi thoda pareshan hu. Toh clearly main bata raha hu agar aap ek se do mahina agar extend karoge ise without paying any amount, toh main January ke last mein kuch main product ke bare mein soch sakta hu ki ise main aage mein payment karne ke bare mein. Lekin currently main do mahine toh bilkul kuch bhi nahi karne wala. Matlab December tak main abhi kuch nahi karne wala. January ke last mein karna hoga toh aap mujhe ek baar call karna, us time pe agar mera mann hua, toh mann kya us time pe agar rahi agar issues solved, toh main us time pe aapko renew kar dunga. Lekin abhi filhaal main nahi karunga.
Executive: Achha, theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Till December I am not capable for renewal of that.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Nahi, main sir isko, main genuinely aapko batau, main hum isko max to max isi uh month tak hold kar sakte hain. Aur main aapko yahi suggest karunga ki aap haan haan, nahi aap abhi usko possible nahi hai.
Executive: Haan, nahi nahi main yeh nahi keh raha hu ki aap possible nahi hai.
Executive: Haan, main yeh nahi keh raha hu sir aap abhi ke abhi usko decide kijiye, aap you can take your time. Uh, aap figure out kar sakte hain agar kuch one or the other way agar nikalta hai toh. Kyunki maine aapko bataya ki hamare paas clearly, maine aapko clearly isliye bata diya ki aap December, January mein main kuch decide kar bhi paunga. Main yeh aapke chaar din, paanch din mein main decide nahi kar paunga. Hmm hmm. Agar aap us, us time tak hold kar sakte ho toh it's good. Agar nahi kar sakte ho toh main abhi kuch bhi nahi bata paunga. January mein agar nahi hoga toh us time pe main renew kar dunga one year ke liye. Lekin filhaal ke liye toh main bilkul bhi nahi kar paunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Nahi, sir dekhiye main yeh nahi keh raha hu ki aapki services hum download kar denge, aapka services toh chal hi raha hai. Buyleads wagera aa hi raha hai aapke paas. Aur abhi aur isko kahin na kahin main, main aapko yeh bhi keh raha hu ki for the next seven to 10 days hum is cheez ko nahi rokenge. Aapke paas buylead ka flow aur saari cheeze as it is rahengi. Koi usme hum.
Customer: Seven to 10 days ki baat nahi hai, I need time almost for uh, one and a half month. Uske baad hi main kuch kar paunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Nahi, sir ek midway toh apne ko nikalna hi padega aur main yeh nahi keh raha hu ki aap usko immediately decide kijiye. Aur main yeh bhi nahi keh raha hu sir ki uh, aapke, aapko agar finances ka bahut zyada crunch hai tab bhi main aapko nahi suggest karunga. But main agar even by 1% agar aap manage kar sakte hain sir toh kyunki with respect to time.
Customer: Agar kar sakta toh zaroor bolta. Kar sakta toh main zaroor bolta. Nahi kar sakta isliye main bol raha hu ki main abhi January se pehle kuch bhi nahi kar sakta.
Executive: Ek kaam karte hain, ek kaam karte hain Deepak ji. Abhi toh aaj 18 tarikh hai, main aapse next week mein na 24-25 tarikh ke baad connect karta hu ek baar. Theek hai? Let's see ki agar kuch nikal sake toh aur uske baad uh, hum isko finalize kar denge. Hai na? Main aapki services download nahi kar raha hu. Sab kuch aapka as it is chalega. There is no issue. Ek baar us time connect kar lenge aur koi bhi possibility hogi toh dekh lenge. Hai na? Before that I'll ensure ki aapke paas aur koi further call na aaye. Hai na? Aur koi issue toh nahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi, aur koi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai sir, aapke paas na is call ka ek feedback jayega sir. Aap please usko na satisfied mark kar dijiyega. Theek hai sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is getting repeated calls for renewal.

- Customer's business is not running well.

- Customer is not interested in renewing subscription.

- Customer is facing medical issues.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive assured no further calls for 7-10 days.

- Executive will connect after 24-25th of the month.

- Executive assured services will continue as it is.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after 24-25th of the month.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, subscription, buyleads, product line
